text: Cornelis George Boeree (January 15, 1952 â€“ January 5, 2021) was an American psychologist and professor emeritus at Shippensburg University. He worked in personality theory and the history of psychology. Boeree was also the inventor of the auxiliary language Lingua Franca Nova. He was the coeditor of the Lingua Franca Nova dictionary. Davies, Simon and Boeree, C. G. (2018). Disionario de Lingua Franca Nova. Dundee, Scotland: Evertype. He was born in Badhoevedorp, near Amsterdam, in the Netherlands. He died on January 5, 2021 at his home in Shippensburg, Pennsylvania from pancreatic cancer. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Academics from Pennsylvania Category:American psychologists Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:People from North Holland Category:Scientists from Pennsylvania Category:Lingua Franca Nova
title: C. George Boeree
